altTitles.ja: 冗談新選組 風雲児たち外
冗談新選組 風雲児たち外

description.en:
"Shinsengumi" x "Chushingura" A gorgeous double feature of historical dramas!

Taro Minamoto attracts attention for his historical masterpiece ``Fuunjitachi''.
The author's collection of works published in 2003 has been republished as an expanded and revised edition with two new short stories and a new afterword!

A unique collection of works that have been adapted into manga from "Shinsengumi" and "Chushingura", historical dramas that all Japanese people know!
"Joke Shinsengumi'' is Taro Minamoto's first historical drama manga,
"Chushingura Without Honor'' is serialized in "Rekishi Yomihon'' and is an original manga. A controversial work that became a hot topic for its consideration of Chushingura.
The playwright Koki Mitani was a big fan of "Joke Shinsengumi", and in 2004 Minamoto Taro was created as a collaboration project with the NHK taiga drama "Shinsengumi!" The conversation with Koki Mitani is also completely reprinted.
In addition, "Yoshinobu" and "Chakapon-kun" are included as bonus tracks. Furthermore, a new afterword is included.
